column1: The Purple Pig////I had an old fashioned to drink
column2: which was definitely on the strong side
column3: but no complaints here. My favorite dish was the sweet potato polenta because the blend of flavors was sheer nirvana. The milk-braised pork shoulder is also fantastic and basically falls apart as soon as you dive in. I did order the broccoli but thought the portion was way too big in comparison to the sizes of the other dishes. Definite broccoli overkill--I'd try the beets next time. The desserts are all pretty darn godly. Looking forward to my next visit!
